response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product is not just an item, it's a testament to quality and functionality. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering you the chance to own this product for $150. I understand that value perception varies, but I truly believe this price reflects the true essence and benefits of our product. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 150}
